meanings.sent1: The toxic snake's bite can make you very sick.
meanings.sent2: It's important to stay away from toxic chemicals in the lab.
meanings.sent3: The toxic potion turned the wizard's hair bright green!
meanings.sent4: The toxic fumes filled the room, suffocating everyone inside.
meanings.sent5: The toxic waste polluted the river, harming all the fish.

meanings.sent1: Eating too much candy can be toxic to your teeth.
meanings.sent2: Excessive exposure to the sun can have toxic effects on your skin.
meanings.sent3: The toxic gossip spread quickly through the school.
meanings.sent4: The toxic relationship drained all her energy and happiness.
meanings.sent5: The toxic behavior of the bullies made the playground unsafe.

meanings.sent1: The toxic comments online were hurtful and mean.
meanings.sent2: The toxic atmosphere in the office made everyone uncomfortable.
meanings.sent3: His toxic sense of humor always made people laugh.
meanings.sent4: The toxic rivalry between the two teams led to heated arguments.
meanings.sent5: The toxic lies spread by the politician caused chaos in the community.
